description:
Pool._safeTransfer(address,address,uint256) (src/Pool.sol#53-56) uses a dangerous strict equality:

	- [require(bool,string)(success && (data.length == 0 || abi.decode(data,(bool))),POOL : Transfer failed)](src/Pool.sol#L55)

description:
Reentrancy in Pool.addLiquidity(uint256,uint256,uint256,uint256,address,uint256) (src/Pool.sol#106-135):
	External calls:
	- _safeTransferFrom(TOKENA,sender,address(this),amountA) (src/Pool.sol#129)
		- (success,data) = token.call(abi.encodeWithSelector(TRANSFER_FROM_SELECTOR,from,to,value)) (src/Pool.sol#59)
	- _safeTransferFrom(TOKENB,sender,address(this),amountB) (src/Pool.sol#130)
		- (success,data) = token.call(abi.encodeWithSelector(TRANSFER_FROM_SELECTOR,from,to,value)) (src/Pool.sol#59)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- _mint(_to,liquidity) (src/Pool.sol#132)
		- totalSupply = totalSupply.add(value) (src/LP_ERC20.sol#44)
		- totalSupply = totalSupply.sub(value) (src/LP_ERC20.sol#55)
	LP_ERC20.totalSupply (src/LP_ERC20.sol#15) can be used in cross function reentrancies:
	- Pool._mintLiquidity(uint256,uint256,uint256,uint256) (src/Pool.sol#89-104)
	- Pool._removeLiquidity(uint256,uint256,uint256,address,address,address) (src/Pool.sol#138-154)
	- LP_ERC20._update(address,address,uint256) (src/LP_ERC20.sol#41-64)
	- LP_ERC20.totalSupply (src/LP_ERC20.sol#15)
markdown:
Reentrancy in [Pool.addLiquidity(uint256,uint256,uint256,uint256,address,uint256)](src/Pool.sol#L106-L135):
	External calls:
	- [_safeTransferFrom(TOKENA,sender,address(this),amountA)](src/Pool.sol#L129)
		- [(success,data) = token.call(abi.encodeWithSelector(TRANSFER_FROM_SELECTOR,from,to,value))](src/Pool.sol#L59)
	- [_safeTransferFrom(TOKENB,sender,address(this),amountB)](src/Pool.sol#L130)
		- [(success,data) = token.call(abi.encodeWithSelector(TRANSFER_FROM_SELECTOR,from,to,value))](src/Pool.sol#L59)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- [_mint(_to,liquidity)](src/Pool.sol#L132)
		- [totalSupply = totalSupply.add(value)](src/LP_ERC20.sol#L44)
		- [totalSupply = totalSupply.sub(value)](src/LP_ERC20.sol#L55)
	[LP_ERC20.totalSupply](src/LP_ERC20.sol#L15) can be used in cross function reentrancies:
	- [Pool._mintLiquidity(uint256,uint256,uint256,uint256)](src/Pool.sol#L89-L104)
	- [Pool._removeLiquidity(uint256,uint256,uint256,address,address,address)](src/Pool.sol#L138-L154)
	- [LP_ERC20._update(address,address,uint256)](src/LP_ERC20.sol#L41-L64)
	- [LP_ERC20.totalSupply](src/LP_ERC20.sol#L15)

description:
Reentrancy in Pool.addLiquidity(uint256,uint256,uint256,uint256,address,uint256) (src/Pool.sol#106-135):
	External calls:
	- _safeTransferFrom(TOKENA,sender,address(this),amountA) (src/Pool.sol#129)
		- (success,data) = token.call(abi.encodeWithSelector(TRANSFER_FROM_SELECTOR,from,to,value)) (src/Pool.sol#59)
	- _safeTransferFrom(TOKENB,sender,address(this),amountB) (src/Pool.sol#130)
		- (success,data) = token.call(abi.encodeWithSelector(TRANSFER_FROM_SELECTOR,from,to,value)) (src/Pool.sol#59)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- _mint(_to,liquidity) (src/Pool.sol#132)
		- balanceOf[from] = fromBalance.sub(value) (src/LP_ERC20.sol#49)
		- balanceOf[to] = balanceOf[to].add(value) (src/LP_ERC20.sol#59)
markdown:
Reentrancy in [Pool.addLiquidity(uint256,uint256,uint256,uint256,address,uint256)](src/Pool.sol#L106-L135):
	External calls:
	- [_safeTransferFrom(TOKENA,sender,address(this),amountA)](src/Pool.sol#L129)
		- [(success,data) = token.call(abi.encodeWithSelector(TRANSFER_FROM_SELECTOR,from,to,value))](src/Pool.sol#L59)
	- [_safeTransferFrom(TOKENB,sender,address(this),amountB)](src/Pool.sol#L130)
		- [(success,data) = token.call(abi.encodeWithSelector(TRANSFER_FROM_SELECTOR,from,to,value))](src/Pool.sol#L59)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- [_mint(_to,liquidity)](src/Pool.sol#L132)
		- [balanceOf[from] = fromBalance.sub(value)](src/LP_ERC20.sol#L49)
		- [balanceOf[to] = balanceOf[to].add(value)](src/LP_ERC20.sol#L59)
